thread.title: Blake Hutchings
thread.title_full: Servicing Stop reviewed by Blake Hutchings

author: Blake Hutchings
title: Blake Hutchings
text: I found Servicing Stop when looking for the best price for a service online. Not only did they do the price comparison for me (much better than I had managed to find with a manual search), but they provided a collection and drop off service to boot. The telephone conversation to inform me of the suggested work for the car was very clear and pressure-free and I felt both involved and in a safe pair of hands. I would recommend Servicing Stop without reservation.
